Package Engine

Class TaskScheduler.ForEachTask<T>

java.lang.Object
Engine.TaskScheduler.SchedulerTask
Engine.TaskScheduler.ForEachTask<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the data elements.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Task
Enclosing class:
TaskScheduler
public class TaskScheduler.ForEachTask<T> extends TaskScheduler.SchedulerTask
Represents a SchedulerTask for iterating over an array of data elements.

  • Constructor Details

    • ForEachTask

      protected ForEachTask(TaskScheduler ts, double seconds, T[] data, Consumer<T> x, int idx)
      Constructs a ForEachTask with the specified delay, data array, consumer function, and starting index.
      Parameters:
      ts - The TaskScheduler instance.
      seconds - The delay in seconds before executing the task.
      data - The array of data elements.
      x - The consumer function to execute for each data element.
      idx - The starting index in the data array.
